name: Cisco | IOS | Security | Attack | IP Spoofing #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7100-3-OVERLAPIP: Interface Cable1/0, IP address 10.100.1.122 from MAC 0016.c7dd.4d2c is already in use on Cable1/0.  SID = 2218

patterns.value_re: %UBR\S+00-3-OVERLAPIP: Interface (?P<interface>\S+), IP address (?P<src_ip>\S+) from MAC (?P<src_mac>\S+) is already in use on .+.  SID = \d+
